description:
Have you ever played a ship based guessing game and thought to yourself, this is boring? If only there were airplanes and submarines.

Well now you can play three dimensional Craft based guessing game with abilities.

Have no friends? No worries you can play against a battle trained AI? Just try to beat it on the hardest difficulty, I bet you can't. Have friends? Then teach me how to make them myself, and then challenge them to a game of 25920.

The game is still a work in progress, bugs certainly exist but it is technically playable.
